format: A quarterly multiple time series from 1947(1) to 2004(4) with 2 variables.
description:
Description
Time series data on 2 US macroeconomic variables for 1947–2004.
title: Quarterly US Macroeconomic Data (1947–2004, Stock & Watson)
reference: Online complements to Stock and Watson (2007).

parameters.gdp:
real GDP for the United States in billions of chained (2000) dollars
seasonally adjusted, annual rate.
parameters.tbill:
3-month treasury bill rate. Quarterly averages of daily dates
in percentage points at an annual rate.
